channel.title: Starlink on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Starlink on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: China’s Guowang megaconstellation is more than another version of Starlink
item.description: “This is a strategy to keep the US from intervening… that’s what their space architecture is designed to do.”

item.title: SpaceX says states should dump fiber plans, give all grant money to Starlink
item.description: SpaceX seeks more cash, calls fiber “wasteful and unnecessary taxpayer spending.”

item.title: Starlink tries to block Virginia’s plan to bring fiber Internet to residents
item.description: SpaceX wants more money, asks Trump admin to reject state’s broadband grant plan.

item.title: Starlink kept me connected to the Internet without fail—until Thursday
item.description: “Starlink went down across the entire front.”
